info.title: Authorization Server API
info.description:
OAuth 2.0 Authorization Server with Pushed Authorization Requests (PAR), Rich Authorization Requests (RAR), and Grant Management support.

**Features:**
- Pushed Authorization Requests (PAR) for secure request transmission
- Rich Authorization Requests (RAR) with `authorization_details`
- Grant Management with `grant_id` propagation in token responses
- Progressive permission elevation with `merge` action

Visit the [Interactive Demo](/demo/index) to see the complete authorization flow with progressive permission elevation.

post.description: Creates a pushed authorization request and returns a request_uri for use in the authorization endpoint. Supports Rich Authorization Requests (RAR) with authorization_details.

grant_id.description: Required when grant_management_action is merge, replace, or update

permission_elevation.summary: Merge additional permissions into existing grant

post.description: Presents consent screen to user and returns authorization code upon approval. Use request_uri from PAR response.
Exchanges authorization code for access token. Returns grant_id and authorization_details in the response.

code_verifier.description: PKCE code verifier (required if code_challenge was sent in PAR)

get.summary: Retrieves a list of authorization requests.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionfilter)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionorderby)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: The value of $expand query option is a comma-separated list of navigation property names, stream property names, or $value indicating the stream content of a media-entity. The corresponding related entities and stream values will be represented inline, see [Expand](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionexpand)

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptiontop)
